events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the Software Engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
John Doe's application was categorized under the Engineering department for the software developer opening based on his resume and skills.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to coordinate with John Doe and guide him through the hiring process for the engineer role.
Phone screening completed successfully, John Doe demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving approaches.
John Doe has confirmed his availability for the next stage and expressed enthusiasm about the engineering position and our company.
Scheduled a technical interview with John Doe for May 15 at 2 PM to evaluate his coding skills and system design capabilities.
Technical interview completed, John Doe performed well on coding exercises and displayed a solid understanding of software architecture.
The HR interview for John Doe has been scheduled for May 18 at 11 AM to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
HR interview with John Doe went smoothly; he demonstrated great alignment with company values and expectations.
An official offer has been sent to John Doe outlining the software engineer position, salary, and benefits package.
John Doe responded positively to the offer, expressing excitement and willingness to join the engineering team.
John Doe officially accepted the job offer for the software engineer role. We look forward to onboarding him soon.
Onboarding process has begun for John Doe, including IT setup, orientation scheduling, and introduction to the engineering team.
The hiring process for John Doe has been successfully completed, and he has started work as a software engineer.
